tags.name: Internal - Bsg Entity Type Resource Mappings

get.summary: Get all hedge funds

parameters.name: requestBody
parameters.description: This body has the same JSON format as that from /hedge-funds/{id}.You need to replace variables in {} with example values for this resource

get.summary: Get all hedge funds with specified fields

parameters.name: field1
parameters.description: A hedge fund field

parameters.name: field2
parameters.description: Second  hedge fund field

parameters.name: field3
parameters.description: Third hedge fund field

get.summary: Filter and sort hedge funds by specified field

parameters.name: filterField
parameters.description: The hedge fund field to filter by

parameters.name: filterOperator1
parameters.description: Options - eq (equal), neq (not equal), ge (greater or equal), le (less or equal), gt (greater than) and lt (less than)

parameters.name: filterValue
parameters.description: The value of the hedge fund filterField. For date use yyyy-MM-dd format, e.g. 2017-01-01

parameters.name: sortField
parameters.description: The hedge fund field to sort resoponse in acending order (Prefix '-' for sorting in descending order, e.g. -id)

get.summary: Get all hedge funds with specified relationships embedded

parameters.name: includeField1
parameters.description: First hedge fund relationship to be embedded in the response

parameters.name: includeField2
parameters.description: Second hedge fund relationship to be embedded in the response

get.summary: Get a hedge fund by id

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Backstop ID of the hedge fund

delete.summary: Delete an existing hedge fund by id

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Backstop ID of the hedge fund

patch.summary: Update an existing hedge fund by id

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Backstop ID of the hedge fund
